rows.label: tev022501_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Raleigh about Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Raleigh about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask about Raleigh's BLADE colleagues.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask about Raleigh's BLADE colleagues.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Raleigh about data probes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Raleigh about data probes.

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Mira is a huge world, and we still know next to
nothing about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0002
rows.name:
Our base at New LA is well established, but we're
now in the same position as our ancestors who landed
at Plymouth Rock with a whole new world to explore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0003
rows.name:
And to achieve that goal, we'll need to install data
probes throughout Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Did you already hear about FrontierNav from Defense
Secretary Nagi?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0005
rows.name:
If you haven't, you should go ask him.
I think he's waiting for you at the BLADE barracks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm a member of Team Corwin, which is centered
around Captain Corwin and his band of explorers
from back on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0009
rows.name:
It's a team loaded with former professional explorers.
Can you imagine a better group for surveying Mira?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0010
rows.name:
A lot of BLADEs get swept up in the idea of joining a
team like that and going on grand adventures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0011
rows.name:
And while I'm a sub-leader now, I must admit that I
used to be one of them. ...I suppose I still am, actually.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0012
rows.name:
As a veteran of the Coalition forces, I was initially
assigned to Irina's Interceptors division.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0013
rows.name:
But when I heard Corwin talk about his ambitions,
I decided I wanted to be a part of them and applied
for a transfer to the Pathfinders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0014
rows.name:
The captain really is a fascinating person. As a new
recruit, I'm sure they're working you hard, but you
should speak with Corwin if you ever have the chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Nelson's team has recently begun surveying unexplored
areas.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0023
rows.name: As a fellow Pathfinder, I pray for their safe return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0038
rows.name:
You're that new recruit from Elma's team that
discovered what happened to Nelson's crew, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0039
rows.name:
You have my thanks for that. My team has worked
with Nelson's on many occasions, and we were all
terribly worried about them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0040
rows.name:
Your report was heartbreaking, but at least now we
finally know what happened.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0041
rows.name:
As Pathfinders, my team has resolved to fill the void
left by their passing and do everything we can to
expand FrontierNav throughout Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0054
rows.name:
In addition to regular data probes, there are auxiliary
models that can be placed in neighboring placement
sites to improve the surrounding probes' capabilities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0055
rows.name:
By putting them to clever use, we Pathfinders can
significantly increase the amount of resources we mine
and revenue we earn.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0056
rows.name:
Our job is more than just tromping around Mira
installing data probes, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0057
rows.name:
The best Pathfinders are the ones who plan from day
one how to make the most of such options.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0073
rows.name:
Have you heard of duplicator probes?
They're a type of auxiliary probe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0087
rows.name:
I'm told they can duplicate the functions of the
data probe they are placed adjacent to on the
FrontierNav grid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0088
rows.name:
If true, it's something that could be put to really good
use...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0089
rows.name:
Basically, it would allow us to double the capabilities of
the limited amount of high-performance data probes
that are available to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0090
rows.name:
You could make a considerable amount of revenue by
using them wisely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Raleigh about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0074
rows.name: We managed to rescue Bates back in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0075
rows.name:
However, while we were there, we were attacked by a
mysterious xenoform that called herself "Tempera."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0076
rows.name:
She was extremely strong, and seemed to hate humans
for some reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0077
rows.name:
I doubt that she's just going to leave us alone now.
I'd better tell the other Pathfinders to be alert.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Raleigh about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0078
rows.name: Thanks to you, Bates was able to make it home safely.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0079
rows.name:
Poor kid really seems traumatized by what happened.
Just walking past a Skell earlier was enough to trigger
a memory that left him quivering.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0080
rows.name:
Was that Tempera woman in the black Skell really so
terrifying?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0081
rows.name:
Well, I'd better warn the other Pathfinders about her.
I have a bad feeling this isn't over yet...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_SEL3011
rows.name: Ask Raleigh about team leaders.

rows.label: tev022501_SEL3021
rows.name: Ask Raleigh about recent developments.

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0082
rows.name:
Ha! That reminds me—do you know why only our team
addresses its leader as "Captain"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0083
rows.name:
Captain Corwin is fond of saying, "We may have guns,
but we aren't soldiers—we're a team of adventurers
exploring an uncharted world, and I am your captain!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0084
rows.name:
He says it so often that everyone just started calling
him that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0085
rows.name:
I guess it's the people who embody a team's ideals that
naturally gravitate towards becoming the leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0086
rows.name:
I'm sure it's like that with your Elma, hmm?
Only when you have a person like that can a team
truly come together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0091
rows.name:
We've suffered a great many losses,
but Team Corwin is still standing strong.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0092
rows.name:
Bates, Peter, and Captain Corwin have all made it
back to us alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0093
rows.name:
And it's all thanks to you. I could never have
accomplished what you did myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0094
rows.name:
So thank you. We're all honored to be working with
you to further expand FrontierNav![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_SEL4011
rows.name: Ask Raleigh about team leaders.

rows.label: tev022501_SEL4021
rows.name: Ask Raleigh about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0095
rows.name:
Did I ever tell you why only our team addressed its
leader as "Captain"?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0096
rows.name:
Captain Corwin was fond of saying, "We have guns,
but we aren't soldiers—we're a team of adventurers
exploring an uncharted world, and I am your captain!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0097
rows.name:
He said it so often that everyone just started calling
him that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0098
rows.name:
I guess it's the people who embody a team's ideals that
naturally gravitate towards becoming the leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0099
rows.name:
And once a team loses that person,
I suspect that few are able to survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0100
rows.name: Sadly, I doubt Team Corwin will fare any differently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0105
rows.name:
I already told this to Peter, but...I'm thinking about
dissolving the team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0106
rows.name:
I just don't have the strength to shoulder all of what
I'd be inheriting from Captain Corwin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev022501_MSG0107
rows.name:
I hope Team Elma continues to enjoy the success you've
had, and that you never end up where we are now.[ST:wait ]
